notes.text:
Nobleman saw no action, never drew into it, might as well take it out for another econ or a bird ect. I reached legend 3 on the first day of reset with a similar build, but then tilted to legend 1.  I tried to get kog with a bunch of decks, like dinos, but nothing seemed to work. went back to mind scan CA and got kog in a few hours after losing my kog promo match twice LUL.
i detailed my kog promo match a bit in the CA channel in the Discord if interested, it was vs a weevil burn
